participant_1.background:
I grew up with my family and learned to love them.
i dream of winning the lottery.
I work a lifeguard during summer and help out at my family's restaurant during the off season.
I joined a ski club and met a great group of friends.
My first organic purchase was a locally grown banana for my girlfriend.

participant_2.background:
I spend a lot of time reading and researching weird and wonderful things.
I spend my weekends learning about the universe.
i have ink stains on all my shirts.
i like reading mystery novels.
I'd love to explore the country side with my lifted Chevy truck and practice my Italian.

content.text: Hi! I'm a lifeguard, I work at a ski club, and I help out at my family's restaurant. What do you do for work?
I spend most of my time reading and researching weird and wonderful things. What do you like to read?
I like mystery novels, but I also like reading about the universe.
It's a great way to explore a different world! I'd love to explore the country side with my lifted Chevy truck and practice my Italian. Do you like to travel?
I haven't traveled much, but I would love to! What's the most interesting place you've ever been to?
I went to Italy a few years ago and it was amazing! I'd love to go back someday.
That sounds like an amazing place to visit! I've always wanted to go to Europe.
You should definitely go! It's so beautiful and there's so much to see and do.
I'm definitely going to have to plan a trip soon
